channel_description: Ash and Pikachu explore the Johto region in the fourth season of Pokémon the Series. Watch it now on Pokémon TV!

media.description: Our heroes have finally reached the next stop on the road to Johto: Goldenrod City!
media.title: A Goldenrod Opportunity

media.description: Whitney takes our heroes to her uncle's Miltank farm in the outskirts of Goldenrod City.
media.title: A Dairy Tale Ending

media.description: Before leaving Goldenrod City, the flamboyant producer of Poké Talk Radio insists Ash appear on Sunny Morningstar's show to talk about winning the Plane badge.
media.title: Air Time

media.description: En route to Ecruteak City, our heroes make their way through a beautiful national park.
media.title: The Bug Stops Here

media.description: Trying to reach Ecruteak City our heroes are stopped in their tracks, unable to cross a bridge-less river.
media.title: Type Casting!

media.description: Ash, Misty and Brock have reached the famous Ruins of Alph.
media.title: Fossil Fools

media.description: Just outside of Ecruteak City, our heroes see a flying Pidgey being attacked by a huge Fearow and decide to intervene.
media.title: Carrying On

media.description: Caught in a sudden thunderstorm, our heroes quickly seek shelter from the elements at an ominous looking castle on a nearby cliff.
media.title: Hassle in the Castle

media.description: On the way to Ecruteak, a renegade Tauros dashes past our heroes. Seeing an old man in Tauros's path, Ash and Bulbasaur battle the break-away beast.
media.title: Two Hits and a Miss

media.description: Arriving at a beautiful hot springs, Ash, Misty and Brock decide they and their Pokémon need to take a much needed break from their journey.
media.title: A Hot Water Battle

media.description: As our heroes take a break at a shady stream, Misty's Poliwhirl is attacked by a Poliwrath!
media.title: Hook, Line and Stinker

media.description: Brock checks his e-mail at a local Pokémon Center and finds Suzy, the Pokémon breeder who gave Brock Vulpix, has contacted him regarding a Pokémon beauty contest.
media.title: Beauty and the Breeder

media.description: Bingeing on too many burgers during lunch has given Ash a case of indigestion that stops him in his tracks. Unable to help their friend, Misty and Brock contemplate what to do.
media.title: A Better Pill to Swallow

media.description: When a blackout hits a town on the road to Ekruteak City, our heroes realize it puts the Pokémon in the local Pokécenter in jeopardy.
media.title: Power Play

media.description: Enjoying a beautiful day hiking through the mountains on the road to Ekruteak City, Ash and Pikachu chase after a Ledian that speeds by them.
media.title: Mountain Time

media.description: Breaking for lunch at a spot in the forest, our heroes notice a nearby Wobbuffet and begin to look around for it's co-horts, Team Rocket!
media.title: Wobbu-Palooza

media.description: Stopping off at a Pokécenter, the gang looks around for nurse Joy. Suddenly she appears with Chansey, but makes the confusing statement Nurse Joy is seeing a patient.
media.title: Imitation Confrontation

media.description: As our heroes take a brief rest near a river, Ash sees a Snubbull rush by on the opposite bank.
media.title: The Trouble With Snubbull

media.description: As Misty picks the local flora, Togepi wanders over to a very strange looking bush, it appears to have legs...spider legs!
media.title: Ariados, Amigos

media.description: It's a sunny day on the road to Johto when our heroes encounter a Yanma... a troublemaker of a Yanma!
media.title: Wings 'n' Things

media.description: En route to Ekruteak, Ash and company are caught by the sight of a Skiploom racing by. Following after it, they encounter its trainer, Ephram.
media.title: The Grass Route

media.description: Catching a sweet scent on the breeze, Ash and Pikachu follow their noses to a nearby apple orchard.
media.title: The Apple Corp!

media.description: When Team Rocket attacks our heroes as they travel through a mountain pass, Weezing's Smoke Screen attack separates Togepi and Misty.
media.title: Houndoom's Special Delivery

media.description: Arriving in Ecruteak, Ash immediately heads to the Gym to challenge it's leader for his next Johto League badge.
media.title: A Ghost of a Chance

media.description: Anxious to acquire the next Johto League badge, Ash challenges Ecruteak City's Gym Leader, Morty.
media.title: From Ghost to Ghost

media.description: Enjoying a quick snack at a local cafe, Misty notices a poster featuring a traditional Japanese tea ceremony.
media.title: Trouble's Brewing

media.description: On their way to Olivine City, Brock and Misty break for lunch while Ash polishes his Johto League badges.
media.title: All That Glitters!

media.description: On the dry and dusty road to Olivine City, our heroes notice beautiful lights shining in the sky ahead of them.
media.title: The Light Fantastic

media.description: As our heroes pass through a dense forest, Brock explains that there are some pretty scary Pokémon hang out in this neck of the woods.
media.title: UnBEARable

media.description: On their way to Olivine City, our heroes run into their old friend and shutterbug, Todd! As Todd and our friends catch up, a frozen Sunkern falls from the sky.
media.title: Moving Pictures

media.description: As Todd and our heroes take a lunch break on a rocky mountain top, a Swinub rushes at them from a nearby crevasse.
media.title: Spring Fever

media.description: On their quest to capture Articuno on film, Todd and our heroes run into a frozen Jigglypuff!
media.title: Freeze Frame

media.description: On their way to Olivine City, our heroes pass through a dangerous looking canyon full of unstable boulders. When the rocks begin to give-way in an avalanche-like fury, a few fiery Pokémon rush to the rescue.
media.title: The Stolen Stones

media.description: On the outskirts of a small town, our heroes run into a young boy named Bucky. He tells our friends of his woes in trying to capture a Dunsparce.
media.title: The Dunsparce Deception

media.description: Knowing our heroes are still en-route to Olivine, Team Rocket lies in wait. Dressed as scientists, they explain they've just repaired the amazing Poké Pod.
media.title: The Wayward Wobbuffet

media.description: The morning sun shines brightly upon our heroes and their Pokémon after spending the night next to a sparkling stream.
media.title: Sick Daze

media.description: As Ash and company pass through an intriguing little village, they notice a Feraligatr in the midst of a battle.
media.title: Ring Masters

media.description: On the long trek to Olivine City, our heroes notice Pikachu looks a bit worn out. Just then, an old man appears from beside the path and explains the soil in this region contains minerals that absorb electricity.
media.title: The Poké Spokesman

media.description: As our heroes and their Pokémon enjoy another fine meal prepared by Brock, Golbat begins to act strangely and flies away. Brock, Ash and Misty chase after the Flying-type and end up at an archaeological dig.
media.title: Control Freak!

media.description: An aging artist and his Smeargle assistants get in some hot water when they attempt to turn a town into their next great masterpiece!
media.title: The Art of Pokémon

media.description: At the end of a long day, our heroes search for a Pokémon Center in a small town near Olivine City.
media.title: The Heartbreak of Brock

media.description: Nearing Olivine City, our heroes notice a field full of windmills. Deciding the breezy windmill field is a nice place to take a break and get some fresh air, our heroes release their Pokémon from their Poké Balls and begin to set up a picnic.
media.title: Current Events

media.description: Overly excited to see Ash, Bayleef runs towards him at full-tilt. Inadvertently, Bayleef uses Tackle Attack and knocks Ash for a loop.
media.title: Turning Over A New Bayleef

media.description: When our heroes stumble upon a one-day street performance, they get to see all types of Pokémon with unique skills.
media.title: Doin' What Comes Natu-rally

media.description: When our heroes happen upon an unusual formation in the middle of a grassy field, Brock believes it is a crop circle... placed there by aliens!
media.title: The Big Balloon Blow-Up

media.description: Strolling through downtown, our heroes notice a mob of girls chasing someone down. Suddenly, a man in a black cape and hat runs up to Ash and gives him a package to hold.
media.title: The Screen Actor's Guilt

media.description: Our heroes are camped out by a lake where Ash wakes up one morning and sees a Rhydon emerging from the water.
media.title: Right On, Rhydon

media.description: Ash and his friends stop at an air station to get a closer look at the Leviathan 2, a luxury dirigible taking passengers on a flight around the world.
media.title: The Kecleon Caper

media.description: The Nurse Joy at Lake Lucid's Pokémon Center is famous among Water-type Pokémon Trainers, so Misty is thrilled when our heroes' travels take them to the lake.
media.title: The Joy of Water Pokémon

media.description: The way to Olivine City and Ash's next Gym challenge lies across a desert of sand and rock. Just as Ash and his friends start to cross it, Team Rocket ambushes them and scoops up Pikachu.
media.title: Got Miltank?

media.description: Our heroes reach Olivine City and make a beeline for the Gym, where Gym Leader Jasmine accepts Ash's challenge.
media.title: Fight for the Light

media.description: Ash and his friends are in Cianwood City with Janina, an apprentice at the Olivine Gym.
media.title: Machoke, Machoke Man
